This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> I noticed when I click on a movie and go to server 4, I get this message:
Due to security concerns, your access request has been denied. Kindly close your browser completely and try again. Kindly refrain from opening the developer tools (eg: F12).
Happens even if I don't open DevTools. 

I'm not able to reproduce it until I open DevTools.

You can try to use these rules (only for user rules):
```adblock
animeshqip.org#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'redirectIfDevToolsOpened', 'noopFunc')
abysscdn.com#%#//scriptlet('set-session-storage-item', 'devtool', '$remove$')
abysscdn.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-suppress-native-method', 'sessionStorage.getItem', '"devtool"', 'prevent')
abysscdn.com#%#(()=>{const o={apply:(o,t,n)=>{if(!n[0]?.includes?.("debugger"))return Reflect.apply(o,t,n)}};window.Function.prototype.constructor=new Proxy(window.Function.prototype.constructor,o)})();
abysscdn.com#%#(()=>{const e={apply:(e,t,n)=>{try{if("debuggerChecker"===n[1]||"DevtoolsDetector"===n[1]){const e=n[0];for(const t of Object.values(e))t&&"object"==typeof t&&(Object.hasOwn(t,"isEnable")&&(t.isEnable=()=>!1),Object.hasOwn(t,"isOpen")&&(t.isOpen=()=>!1))}}catch(e){}return Reflect.apply(e,t,n)}};window.Object.defineProperty=new Proxy(window.Object.defineProperty,e)})();
```
Or just try to clear `sessionStorage` for `abysscdn.com`.

<hr>

> Also noticed this tracking pixel:
`https://webmasters.ksalsocial.online/pixel-track/RE1k5bTIEH8rF9vIRW6HEvxcCBg0zFO7`

Okay, I have added a rule to block it.
